plugin.name: Aardwolf_Portal_Adder
plugin.author: Szzilleriel
plugin.purpose: addportal portalid# -- automatically completes all steps required to add portal to mapper using dinv
plugin.description: addportal portalid# -- automatically completes all steps required to add portal to mapper using dinv

variables.variable: @g[@G(@W1 - Polished@G)(@W2 - Enhanced@G)(@W3 - Burnished@G)(@W4 - Shiny@G)(@W5 - Vibrant@G)(@W6 - Sparkling@G)(@W7 - Gleaming@G)(@W8 - Shimmering@G)(@W9 - Dazzling@G)(@W10 - Brilliant@G)@g] @r[@R(@W11 - Radiant@R)(@W12 - Wondrous@R)(@W13 - Majestic@R)(@W14 - Exalted@R)(@W15 - Eternal@R)@r] @y[@Y(@W16 - Legendary@Y)(@W17 - Epic@Y)(@W18 - Mythical@Y)(@W19 - Fabled@Y)(@W20 - Divine@Y)@y] @r[@W((@R21 - Godly@W))@r]

muclient.script: function Aardwolf_Portal_Adder(name, line, args) Note("Adding Portal [" .. args.id .. "] :: Please wait 5 seconds.") DoAfterSpecial(1, "dinv portal use " .. args.id, 10) DoAfterSpecial(3, "mapper portal dinv portal use " .. args.id, 10) DoAfterSpecial(4, "xset mark", 10) DoAfterSpecial(5, "Note('Adding Portal :: Complete')", 12) end
